  • Freeze/UnFreeze All Nodes Position : F
  • Add Node : A
  • Delete Node : MouseOver + Suppr
  • Move Node : Drag
  • Add Edges On Selection : E
  • Delete Link : MouseOver + Suppr
  • Select/Unselect : Doubleclick
  • Reset Selection : R
